attributes.action: stop calling taxpayers money government money
attributes.background: for example if you the taxpayer give £2 to a given charity the government will give £2 which in reality is the taxpayer giving £4

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling on the Government to make changes to the rules on GiftAid.
